item.title: $C^*$-independence for $\mathbb{Z}_2$-graded $C^*$-algebras
item.description: arXiv:2401.08293v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: We analyse a notion of $C^*$-independence for $\mathbb{Z}_2$-graded $C^*$-algebras. We provide other notions of statistical independence for $\mathbb{Z}_2$-graded von Neumann algebras and prove some relationships between them. We provide a characterization for the graded nuclearity property.
item.dc:creator: Maria Elena Griseta, Paola Zurlo
